title: @Riot, I reported someone for extreme toxicity 26 days ago.
body:
The guy legit starts walking up mid lane feeding as soon as the smallest thing sets him off. I reported him 26 days ago (http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/d4pQHFE9-riot-check-my-most-recent-player-report) for it.

I encountered him again today and he did the EXACT same thing. The guy needs to be dealt with. He's not reforming. He does this in at least half of his games.

replies.body:
\*plays two games with someone\*

\*this person acts like this in at least half their games\*

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Now, unless that person has only played 4 games I'm pretty sure you can't accurately indicate their behaviour from 2 games worth of experience. Just saying.

I looked at his match history. Even his Ranked games are full of this behaviour.

Also, 2 games 26 days apart. Either my report didn't flag him at all (which means the system is failing the community), or he was punished and still hasn't reformed.

That's really unfortunate that you were unlucky enough to encounter this player more than once. It absolutely gives the impression that the system isn't working/they haven't reformed (hopefully the latter is the case).
If they are repeatedly showing the same toxic behaviour, the system should definitely pick them up. If they were punished and still haven't reformed, they will face harsher punishments - you can read more about the scaling punishments [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Boqd81O0-upcoming-upgrades-to-chat-restrictions). It's worth mentioning that it's ineffective to ask Rioters on the forums to check your reports, if you are seriously concerned that something has gone wrong with your report, you can open a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/). 

I hope that helps - it's just a fair bit of bad luck on your part that you had to deal with them again!
They still should be banned even from that single game, intentional feeding is a high priority and is definitely not tolerated

yeah its alright to let players like this keep playing, each time their punishment is escalated, but what about the minimum 9 people that this 1 player ruins the game for? 9 people who actually want to play the game properly and win games?? priorities for riot are screwed its disappointing

On the one hand, Riot can do what they're doing, give people chances to reform, avoid punishing people because of one mistake or circumstances out of their control and people just have to occasionally deal with the toxic player(s). On the other hand, Riot can crack down hard, ban people for first offences, perma-ban for second/third, forget about giving *anyone* the chance to reform and end up with no one playing because they've all been banned (most of them because of one mistake or circumstances out of their control).

Take your pick.

riot already hands out insta-2 week bans for making 1 mistake for certain things. they are very inconsistent.


e.g i used the word '%%%got' once, and only once, in the history of my level 7 account. 2 week ban. no prior punishments.

ok fine, but why did the person that was intentionally ruining the game (the reason i used that word) not receive the same kind of ban? why does it take a long documented case of them consistently behaving like this to receive one when it took me only 1 match?

Don't worry, Heartvine kisses ass and doesn't look to see what riot actually does, or in this case, doesn't do.

Riot has a massive history of only LOOKING like they give a shit, while not actually doing anything to stop this behaviour.
on this topic, how about a report forum for the aram bots

I noticed that someone started recording the game on op.gg after the 20 minute mark. I watched it. They hardly missed an ult skillshot. The fight at the end with hecarim was weird. Hecarim was right on top of him and he tried to ult, LMAO. Unfortunately for them, they only hit two of the ult shots before Hecarim's fear fucked him right up. Riot really should have a human monitor spectating cases and ban if there are many open and shut examples in their play.

Sucks man even in your high elo, played a rank game today and it was a legit secured win, but our adc ran it down bot (not mid) feeding the 1/5 riven and anyone else, his stupid reason was that his support was not at bot because we lost bot tower because he dc for the first 5 mins or so. 

I really do hope some system would be implemented to stop people like this but its asking for the impossible because Riot couldn't be able to go through hundreds of thousands of people to remove trolls.
